post:
**To celebrate the greatest weekend of the year we are offering discounts left and right.**

Get the best services at the lowest prices, premium infrastructure, highly performant servers, over 11 locations all around the world, great customer support all for a price you would believe it’s fake.
But let us assure you that it’s not. 
This weekend we are turning the market upside down.

**Black Friday LET special:**

**1.** **30% Lifetime discount with Coupon Code BFLT2130** for example you can get a:
**Cloud VPS** - **KVM 1G** - only **€2.75/Month** or **€33.18/Year** with coupon code **BFLT2130** 
Memory: 1GB RAM
Storage: 30GB SSD
CPU: 1vCPU Intel Xeon Gold 5218
 Traffic: 2TB
Ip addresses: 1 IPv4, /64 IPv6
Connection: 1Gbps
- Order link: [https://www.virtono.com/link.php?id=34](https://www.virtono.com/link.php?id=34 "https://www.virtono.com/link.php?id=34")
- Coupon code: BFLT2130
- Available locations: Miami, New York, Paris, Madrid, Amsterdam, Stockholm

The 30% Lifetime discount is available for all services from our website, so just take a look: 
[https://virtono.com/cloud-vps](https://www.virtono.com/link.php?id=35 "https://virtono.com/cloud-vps")

-------

**2. Cloud VPS** - **KVM 512M** - only **€19.95/Year** with coupon code **BF21LET05** (normal price €35.40/Year)
Memory: 512MB RAM
Storage: 15GB SSD
CPU: 1vCPU Intel Xeon Gold 5218
 Traffic: 1TB
Ip addresses: 1 IPv4, /64 IPv6
Connection: 1Gbps
- Order link: [https://www.virtono.com/link.php?id=33](https://www.virtono.com/link.php?id=33 "https://www.virtono.com/link.php?id=33")
- Coupon code: BF21LET05
- Available locations: Miami, New York, Paris, Madrid, Amsterdam, Stockholm

-------

_All VPS plans are instantly set up! Latest os versions from CentOS, Fedora, Debian, Ubuntu and others are available. You can also upload your own iso and install OS via VNC._

-------

![](https://www.virtono.com/images/promo/BF.jpg "")


**Besides the LET offer, we have prepared a series of great sales, including lifetime discounts on all our services limited availability.**

But rest assured that this [Black Friday weekend](https://www.virtono.com/link.php?id=32 "Black Friday weekend") you will be blown away by our great prices, so better ready your wallet and enjoy yourself, because there is no time like this weekend to upgrade your online business to the max.

Make more money while saving more money, that’s the path to success.

**Visit [Virtono.com/Black-Friday](https://www.virtono.com/link.php?id=32 "Virtono.com/Black-Friday") and enjoy the sales.**

----------
